Exclusive Interview with Xingmai Innovation: The Future of Robotic Pool Cleaner
Recently, EqualOcean sat down for an exclusive interview with Wang Shengle, the founder of Xingmai Innovation (Chinese: 星迈创新), a robotic pool cleaner company, to gain in-depth knowledge about their proud technologies and products. Founded in 2022, Xingmai Innovation is dedicated to developing intelligent pool robots and has extensive industry experience in robot technology and development. The following is a part of the conversation during the interview:
Product Innovation & User Experience Transformation
EqualOcean: What are some of the technologies or products that Xingmai Innovation is currently leading?
Wang Shengle: First, let's talk about the existing robotic pool cleaner products on the market. Compared to current robotic home cleaners, there is a significant gap in maturity and intelligence.
Traditional products lack environmental perception sensors, making it hard to detect the pool environment. However, our product adopts a brand-new concept, judging cleaning time based on the size and shape of the pool, and achieves all-around cleaning of the bottom and walls through stereoscopic cleaning technology. We emphasize three-dimensional information processing, which sets us apart from our competitors.
Additionally, our product is equipped with sonar and a navigation sensor to plan cleaning paths. We have also adopted a wireless solution, allowing users to operate it effortlessly with minimal human intervention.
Furthermore, we have developed a mobile application that displays the pool map and provides information on pool status and cleaning routes. The introduction of these technologies and features gives our product a certain competitive advantage in the market.
EqualOcean: What efforts have you made in the product development process to ensure good user experiences?
Wang Shengle: Our team has conducted market and channel research in the United States, France, and other places, gaining a true understanding of local user needs and improving our product planning and user experience.
Our logic is based on the understanding of user scenarios, combined with the actual situation, using cutting-edge technologies for innovation to create truly intelligent and user-friendly products that meet user needs. We do not advocate copying other companies products, as it may bring temporary benefits but cannot meet the needs of high-end pool users. We believe that each company should innovate based on its own products to meet the real needs of customers.
Market Selection & Pricing Strategy
EqualOcean: As you mentioned, Xingmai Innovation has focused its target market on high-end markets such as North America and Europe. Is there a specific consideration behind this? Are other regions like Latin America and Australia being overlooked?
Wang Shengle: No, Latin America and Australia are not being overlooked by our company; they are secondary markets to North America. The most crucial factor is that the United States and Europe occupies the majority share of the entire market, accounting for over 80%. Additionally, US consumers have better affordability and willingness to pay to access better products and services.
From a global market perspective, North America boasts the largest pool capacity, closely followed by Southern Europe. The strategic plan is to concentrate resources in key markets, establishing them as prototypes before expanding to numerous other global markets.
EqualOcean: Could you briefly introduce the pricing strategy and positioning of the upcoming pool robot?
Wang Shengle: Let me share our team's approach first. Our goal is to launch products that meet user needs through innovation. Most of our team members come from unicorn companies in the robotics industry, with experience in researching, manufacturing, and selling robots at a scale of over a million units.
Our pricing strategy is determined based on demand, different from the cost-based pricing strategy that many domestic companies looking to expand overseas adopt. We have conducted in-depth research on consumer needs and preferences in the target market, taking into account the product's features, performance, and quality. We aim to provide high-quality pool robots that meet the performance and user experience requirements of high-end users.
We have also had in-depth discussions with channel partners to ensure that our pricing is aligned with market competitiveness. Driving consumer purchases with strategic pricing, empowering consumers in daily Life, while ensuring sustainable profitability to fuel ongoing product innovation and continuous iteration for enhanced consumer experience. Therefore, our pricing will take into account factors such as product cost, market demand, and competitive environment.
Additionally, we will offer a product line with different configurations and features to meet the needs and budgets of consumers with different pool scenarios. This way, consumers can choose the product that suits their requirements.
Development Plan & Industry Outlook
EqualOcean: Does the company have any specific development plans and strategic goals in the coming years?
Wang Shengle: Firstly, we will heavily focus on driving the iteration and innovation of intelligent robotic pool cleaning technology to become a leader in the industry. We are very confident about the next few years. Our first goal is to enter the top three in the industry next year, and then strive to become a leading player in the entire industry within the next 4 to 5 years. By "leading player," we don't just mean being at the top in terms of sales, but also in terms of brand reputation, user reputation, and even the company value. Of course, we also recognize the importance of revenue generation throughout this process. In addition to pool cleaning, we will also focus on other consumer needs in the pool environment.
EqualOcean: Understood. Looking at the industry as a whole, the robot market is relatively small, and the Robotic pool cleaner market is just a small part of it. So, how do you view the prospects of the entire market?
Wang Shengle: Indeed, the robotic pool cleaner market is only a small part of the overall robot industry. According to the data, the robotic pool cleaner industry had a market size of around USD 1.7 billion last year, while the overall pool industry reached USD 12.1 billion, which includes products with electromechanical and electronic components, such as high-performance pumps and connected devices. However, we believe that through intelligent product iteration and innovation, the scale of the pool robot market has the potential to exceed USD 15 billion.
EqualOcean: What are your views on future robotic pool cleaner trends?
Wang Shengle: In the past, pool cleaning robots were just simple cleaning tools lacking intelligence. The number of new pools added annually reached about 500,000 to 700,000.
However, in the future, intelligent robotic pool cleaners will be able to serve people better, replacing manual labor, including the work done by third-party service companies. This will enable users to enjoy a cleaner, healthier, and safer pool environment. In such a scenario, the utilization rate of pools is expected to increase significantly.
EqualOcean: What opportunities and challenges, in your view, exist in this industry?
Wang Shengle: With a remarkable surge in 2021, the robotic pool cleaner market soared to a staggering USD 1.612 billion, boasting a growth rate surpassing 20%. Demonstrating resilience, the sector's compound annual growth rate has consistently exceeded 16.24% from 2017 to 2021. Forecasts predict a potential market size of USD 2.286 billion by 2023, showcasing an industry propelled by rapid development.
Enduring nearly four decades, the robotic pool cleaner industry boasts a select group of players, leading to heightened market consolidation. However, hindered by traditional brands detached from the core supply chain and a lack of competitive fervor, industry leaders grapple with a profound deficit in product innovation. Consequently, over two decades of industry evolution have failed to yield ground-breaking advancements in product functionality.
Unveiling publicly available data, the triumvirate of industry titans controlled substantial market shares in 2021, with 48%, 25%, and 14% respectively for global shipments of private pool cleaning robots. Presently, the dominant brands predominantly offer wired solutions, leaving ample room for significant leaps forward in cleaning efficacy and the integration of intelligent capabilities. The industry's technological front presents an abundance of untapped potential.
Casting a visionary gaze toward the future, pool robots are poised to revolutionize the consumer experience by offering a seamless synergy between human needs and technological prowess. Through labor displacement, these ingenious machines shall bestow users with immaculate, hygienic, and secure pool environments, ushering in an era of carefree aquatic leisure.
An ardent commitment propels our endeavor to expedite the industry's technological trajectory, forging industry standards and advocating for the universal adoption of wireless, intelligent, and user-friendly products. Our audacious objective for the forthcoming decade envisages elevating the market penetration of pool robots from the prevailing 21% to a remarkable 80% or beyond.
As the pervasive rise of intelligent systems becomes an indomitable force, commensurate advancements in technological prowess loom large. Where once pool cleaning tools could be conceived with a mere 500W or 1000W, the future necessitates an exponential surge in investments across funding, technology, resources, and teams. This multifaceted escalation presents a formidable test of team proficiency and resourcefulness. Amidst fierce industry competition, the crucible of excellence shall ultimately forge the path toward enhanced services and customers.

Tencent Cloud has unveiled a self-developed high-performance computing network called Xingmai, which boasts the industry’s highest communication bandwidth of 3.2T. This network significantly increases GPU utilization by 40%, resulting in a reduction of model training costs by 30% to 60%, and delivers an impressive 10-fold improvement in communication performance for large-scale AI models. Built on Tencent Cloud’s next-generation computing cluster, known as HCC (high-performance computing cluster), Xingmai supports computing scales of up to 100,000 GPU cards. [36Kr, in Chinese]

Xingmai Technology丨The strategic meeting with the theme of “gathering strength to innovate and accelerating intelligent manufacturing” was successfully implemented
Chengyouqing Technology
Follow
--
Listen
Share
On July 1, the new product release and strategic cooperation signing ceremony led by Shenyang Xingmai Technology Co., Ltd. with the theme of “gathering strength to innovate and accelerating intelligent manufacturing” came to a successful conclusion. In the field of new vision, new technology and new materials, technological innovation and industrial application are eternal topics, an inevitable path for building a smart country, and an important focus for technological development and national prosperity.
At the beginning of the meeting, Xu Yong, Marketing Director of Zhongke Junda Vision Technology Co., Ltd., attended as a special guest to share the prospect and future of the current domestic new technology and new materials.
Then, Chen Xingchi, the executive operating officer of Xingmai Technology, elaborated on the company’s main business, business model and strategic planning, and released new products for the company’s new fullerene materials, new visual technology product systems and application industries.
Through the new product release link of Xingmai Technology, the participants had a deeper understanding of the product system in the field of new fullerene materials; high-speed cameras, laser displacement sensors, spectral confocal displacement sensors, and high-speed laser three-dimensional measuring instruments. .
Zhihangchuang (Beijing) Equipment Technology Co., Ltd., Shaanxi Brilliance Heyi Technology Co., Ltd., Shenzhen Shenshi Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd., Shenghuihang (Beijing) Equipment Technology Research Co., Ltd. and many other high-tech enterprises this strategic cooperation event , witnessed the release of multiple series of products of Xingmai Technology, and signed a strategic cooperation agreement on the integration of diversified channels, resources and products.
In the second half of the agenda of the meeting, Du Lanxin, the product director of Shenzhen Shenshi Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd., analyzed the current intelligent technology industry, and shared the main spectral confocal, profile measuring instrument, 3D profile instrument, 3D industrial cameras, line scan cameras, 3D measuring instruments, 3D scanners, point lasers, 3D sensors, rail transit and other product systems.
Kou Hua, CTO of Shaanxi Huachen Heyi Technology Co., Ltd., gave a speech and interpretation on the basic situation, product system and development prospects of his company. He said that Brilliance Heyi is a technical enterprise specializing in the production, learning and research of mechanical simulation test equipment and intelligent vibration isolation and noise reduction equipment. For a long time, the company has adhered to the high-end strategic positioning, led by talents and intelligence, driven by innovation and development, and its products are used in special weapons and equipment, aerospace, aviation, weapons, ships, rail transit, automobiles, electronics, communications, materials , new energy and other fields.
Every cooperation is to go faster and further. After an in-depth meeting in the afternoon, the participating technology companies have a deeper understanding of each other and have more optimistic expectations for the future. Many companies firmly believe that the future of new technology is to break the old industry pattern of fighting alone, and to achieve subversive innovation in technology, products, services and other fields. In this regard, many parties recognized the cooperation and signed a strategic cooperation agreement on the spot.
Looking back at the past, working together allows us to support each other and become partners; facing the future, our mission and vision will surely enable us to empower each other and achieve tomorrow.
It is believed that this strategic meeting of “gathering strength to innovate and accelerating intelligent manufacturing” is just the starting point of multi-party cooperation. In the future, the multi-party will deepen cooperation in technology research and development, product manufacturing, service innovation, talent training, channel resources, etc., and jointly build a new vision The cooperation pattern of the new technology and new material industry has formed a normalized working mechanism, achieved more cooperation results in frequent exchanges and more communication, and jointly created a new model of cooperation in the field of “new technology and new materials”.
--
--

(703) 462-9552
Products
Home Theater Products and Accessories
SI is a technology based U.S. projection screen manufacturer focused on delivering “state-of-the-art” performance. Each screen meets extremely tight tolerances and delivers stunning visuals. SI’s products address constantly changing consumer demands for performance, value, and visual appeal-each strategically aligned with today’s projector trends. SI exist at the bleeding edge of projection screen technology. A key example of this is the new Black Diamond™ screen. Black Diamond enhances projector performance by creating the ultimate contrast (blacker black, whiter whites) and color accuracy (with added vibrant color delivery) in both light and dark environments.
Seymour-Screen Excellence's screens are the most advanced available.  Using proprietary Enlightor-Neo, Ambient-Visionaire, and Radiant screen fabrics, they provide a flawless picture quality, finally enabling you to get the best from both your projector and your sound system in any room.
Founded in 1995, SIM2 is an Italian electronics company and worldwide manufacturer of award winning home theater products and leading provider of high-performance large screen front projection systems. Featured products include the new Crystal series, and the Mico series of LED projectors.
A family-owned business since 1947, Stewart maintains the highest standards in screen design, craftsmanship, and customer service. Stewart Filmscreen continues to design and manufacturer innovative screen products for both the residential and commercial markets, bringing the same quality and innovation to all viewing environments. Models include: Luxus Deluxe Screenwall, StudioTek 130 G3 , Cabaret Screen,Firehawk G3.
Wolf Cinema is committed to providing the highest quality reference displays to the discerning customer. Wolf specializes in studio quality displays that can reproduce the image as the cinematographer intended you to see it. Our displays are not only reference quality, but designed addressing the demands of custom installation, integration, control, flexibility and longevity.
Indulge in a big screen experience at your own home with home theater projectors and 4K OLED and LED TVs from Sony.  See every scene in unmatched clarity and incredible detail.
All Aerial loudspeaker systems are designed and constructed with fanatical attention to quality and detail. Decades of design and manufacturing experience have taught us that craftsmanship and technology go hand-in-hand when creating products of uncompromising performance and genuine long-term value. World class manufacturing techniques and production equipment are employed, complemented by the work of skilled craftsmen when only experienced hands will do. Aerial Acoustics. Every detail matters.
JBL Synthesis® is the world’s first complete, integrated multi-channel audio system designed specifically for custom installation home theater, and was the first system that enabled custom calibration to deliver optimum performance in any room. JBL Synthesis® Multichannel Audio System has been inducted into the CEDIA Product Hall of Fame.
Meridian Audio has been designing and creating state-of-the-art audio and video home entertainment systems for over 35 years. The underlying design philosophy for our systems is to combine the ground-breaking functional performance of all the components with a striking visual appeal; aesthetics that make a bold design statement, but one that’s always in harmony with the surroundings.

The Analysis Plus hollow oval design clearly uses the conductor more efficiently, and the result is shown in the measured resistance. The hollow oval cables maintain a low resistance value, even at 20 kHz, where the resistance of the round cable has increased dramatically. This increased resistance and slow rise time rolls off the high frequencies, which leads to the difference between the measured signal at the amp and the signal measured at the speaker terminals. This design principle is utilized throughout the Analysis Plus product line, and is the reason why hollow oval cables look and sound better than any competitor’s products.

Torus Power Conditioners feature toroidal isolation transformers that electrically isolate connected equipment from the incoming power. Series Mode Surge Suppression does not shunt the spike to ground like MOV’s do, therefore preventing ground contamination.

Home Automation in Ashburn, VA
Home automation often evokes images of space and the future, but it doesn’t need to change your lifestyle to that degree. Modern technology allows you to automate your home right now without traveling to the future.
Evolution Audio Video is a proud leader in home automation in the Ashburn, VA, area. We are an authorized dealer for Control4 products, giving you access to the very best of home automation.
Our Control4 Products
Control4 products are easy to install in any home, often with no remodeling necessary. We carry both wired and wireless Control4 products, allowing you the flexibility your home needs to be automated as you desire.
Home automation with Control4 is customizable. The customization allows you to start small and add to the system as your needs change and your budget grows. Control4 uses monitors placed throughout your home to control lighting, audio, video, and more from wherever you are.
We can help you select the perfect products for you and your family so that you regain control of your home and the technology used inside it.
Our Benefits
Home automation allows you to take control of your home and simplify the complexities of life. There are multiple devices used throughout our homes and home automation brings the control of those devices under one system.
Our products allow you to control not only your technology, but also lighting and heating throughout the home. Home automation systems can even adjust your heating and lighting and other appliances when you’re outside of the home using your smartphone.
